summary: Implements a Home Assistant cover platform for KNX/IP devices, defining configuration options, platform setup, and a cover entity class that sends KNX commands to open, close, stop, set position and tilt, and processes state updates from KNX group addresses, including optional travel‑time handling and value inversion.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to control and monitor KNX/IP motorized blinds or shades through the Home Assistant UI and automations, providing seamless integration of KNX cover devices into the smart‑home ecosystem.
